reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable, soft, and well-made, with one noting it's a perfect staple piece for colder months.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy and stylish
items.body: This sweater is a winter staple! Super comfortable, cozy, soft and well-made. Material feels like high quality and it holds shape after washing. I bought 2 in different colors! Read more
items.author: Vita T.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Sweater
items.body: This sweater is so comfortable!!! I love everything about it and it’s not light weight either! Read more
items.author: Cattz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: So soft and warm! Would recommend. I bought it in green and Brown. Read more
items.author: Aaron

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's Cute and Warm
items.body: Fabric quality was not as plush or thick as advertised. It was a gift and still a very nice color. Read more
items.author: G-Kay

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice Color - Poor Fit
items.body: The dusty lavender color I purchased is really pretty! However, the fit is not flattering because as the size goes up the fit becomes boxy and the sleeves get longer. So it ended up looking frumpy and unflattering on me. No need to size up...maybe size down! Read more
items.author: Shawna

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING
items.body: Was just scrolling through amazon like always and came across this sweater. (it’s currently 80) Bought it since fall/winter is coming up and this looked like a really nice quality and style. Got it in the color brown and it is soooo soft and thick. Such a nice quality for the price! fits true to size/slightly oversized, perfect for leggings and boots! Covers my butt too! overall great purchase, I definitely will be getting more colors! Read more
items.author: Mary M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and cozy
items.body: Do warm and cozy Read more
items.author: irene C Huston

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Scratchy material.
items.body: The color is just great, the fabric felt scratchy when I tested it against my neck. No deal at that point, I couldn't bring myself to wear it, which is a shame as I was excited to wear it. Washes well and is quite heavy and thick. I'll probably give it away to someone who isn't irritated by the fabric. Update: After writing this review, I decided to try to wear it. I looked awful, the horizontal ribbing made me look huge and frumpy. I changed into a different shirt and stuck this one into a spare closet. I can't think of anyone I know that would want to wear this wreck of a sweater, you might be able to glue or sew some Christmas decor on it and make an ugly Christmas sweater. Not worth the 40 and some odd dollars. Read more
items.author: Two cents

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Split is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Split is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Rose Tan, Tan, Brown, Gray, Grass Green, Dark Grey, Apricot, Black, Coffee, Navy Blue, Gold Flame, B Brown, Purple, Racing Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
